mapper.select: select lineup_key ,user_key ,team_key ,game_key ,code_key ,team_side ,lineup_index ,mercenary_state from lineup where game_key = #{game_key} AND team_side = #{team_side}

select user_key ,user_id ,user_password ,user_name ,user_mail ,user_phone ,user_address1 ,user_address2 ,user_position ,user_intro from user where user_key IN( select user_key from membership where team_key = #{team_key} )
select user_key ,user_id ,user_password ,user_name ,user_mail ,user_phone ,user_address1 ,user_address2 ,user_position ,user_intro from user where user_key = #{user_key}
mapper.insert: insert into user( user_id, user_password, user_name, user_mail, user_phone, user_address1, user_address2, user_position, user_intro ) value( #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_mail}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address1}, #{user_address2}, #{user_position}, #{user_intro} );

insert into team( TEAM_NAME, TEAM_FDATE, CODE_KEY, TEAM_FEE, TEAM_INTRO, TEAM_EMBLEM, TEAM_NOTICE, TEAM_NUM, TEAM_RECRUIT_YN ) value( #{team_name}, now(), #{code_key}, #{team_fee}, #{team_intro}, #{team_emblem}, #{team_notice}, #{team_num}, #{team_recruit_yn} );
insert into membership( USER_KEY, TEAM_KEY, MEMBERSHIP_ROLE, TEAM_JOINDATE ) value( #{user_key}, #{team_key}, #{membership_role}, now() );
insert into game( TEAM_KEY, GAME_DATE, GAME_LOCATION, GAME_TITLE, GAME_CONTENTS, GAME_FDATE ) value( #{team_key}, now(), #{game_location}, #{game_title}, #{game_contents}, now() );
